Hi! I'm Ahmed.

I'm a fourth year student at the Ohio State University pursing a Computer Science and Engineering degree with a specialization in Database Systems and Data Analytics . I've taken an interest in web development and I'm constantly working to expand my skillset.

See some of my work below and don't hesitate to get in touch with me. I look forward to working with you!
